Description:
We are seeking a dynamic Sales Manager with expertise in SMS marketing to join our team in Doha. As a Sales Manager, you will be responsible for developing and executing effective sales strategies, leveraging your extensive network and market knowledge, and leading a dedicated sales team to achieve and exceed targets. You will play a pivotal role in promoting our SMS marketing services, building strong client relationships, and ensuring client satisfaction.Key Responsibilities:Develop and implement effective sales strategies focused on SMS marketing services.
Utilize your extensive network and local market knowledge to identify and engage potential clients.
Lead the entire sales cycle from prospecting to closing deals, achieving and exceeding sales targets.
Establish and maintain strong relationships with decision makers in potential client organizations.
Conduct cold calls, presentations, and negotiations to showcase the value of our SMS marketing solutions.
Collaborate with our internal teams to tailor marketing strategies that align with client needs.
Leverage your digital marketing expertise to showcase the agency's capabilities and offerings.
Utilize your strong PR skills and database to generate leads and build a solid pipeline.
Provide exceptional account management to ensure client satisfaction and ongoing success.
Utilize your leadership skills to motivate and guide the sales team toward achieving collective goals.
Monitor and analyze performance metrics, utilizing your numerical skills to calculate ROIs.
Utilize Google Analytics and other tools to refine marketing strategies and demonstrate results.Skills
Skills:
SMS Marketing Expertise: Proven experience in SMS marketing strategies and a track record of successful deal closures.
Digital Marketing Proficiency: Strong understanding of digital marketing techniques, including Google Analytics and various marketing methods.
